Package curam.util.jmx

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CuramMBeanContext
    The execution context for Curam MBeans.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CuramJMXUtil
    A collection of useful methods to use when dealing with the JMX infrastructure.
    CuramMBeanAbstract
    Superclass of all Curam MBeans.
    CuramMBeanUtil
    MBean utility class which provides common statistic calculations.
    NumericCounterStatistics
    Data structure with statistics for a numerical counter.
    NumericCounterStatisticsAggregator
    A utility class that holds and aggregates statistics for a positive numeric counter.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CuramJMXUtil.CallableException
    Exception thrown by the CuramJMXUtil.runAndRecord(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T>, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

Package curam.util.jmx Description

This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
